activities: Personal Information Received from the EU/EEA and/or Switzerland:  Employee information for employment purposes.  Participant and investigator data for purposes of pharmaceutical research services including clinical trials. Data relating to research study participants are always blinded to WCC.  Because of the global nature of WCC sponsors and their research studies generating the data processed by WCC, WCC may receive and send personal data to members of the European Union.
contacttitle1: Associate Director of Quality and Regulatory Affairs
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: WorldCare agrees to participate in the dispute resolution procedures of the EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) pursuant to the Safe Harbor Principles.
